content:
Inviting all business owners for a exceptional opportunity to showcase/sell your products and services at a conference coming up in our own backyard. 

Target Audience: 
- 5,000 - 10,000 attendees expected
- Telugu speaking professionals with disposable income range of $100K - $250K+ 
- High net worth individuals

When & Where: 
May 26th - 28th @ NJ Convention & Exposition Center

As a sponsor, you will have the opportunity to:
- Present your products and services in a prominent location
- Display your company’s logo and branding materials at the conference
- Network with attendees and establish new business relationships
- Access to a highly targeted and engaged audience for lead generation and market research

Please reach out to me if you would like to discuss further.
